items.content_html: Performant and lightweight Node.js library to convert PDF file/buffer pages to PNG or JPEG files/buffers without binary and OS dependencies (except MacOs on arm64). Designed with high focus on performance and developer experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable toaster notification library for React built with TypeScript. This library provides an easy-to-use API for displaying toast notifications with customizable icons, styles, positions, and animations.

items.content_html: Biscuitman is a super lightweight open-source privacy consent manager for your website
items.title: replete/biscuitman: Biscuitman is a super lightweight open-source privacy consent manager for your website

items.content_html: A lightweight, simple queue system designed for small tasks that need to be executed in a queued manner. This system is not a full-fledged message queue like BullMQ, RabbitMQ, or similar systems, but it offers an efficient solution for handling tasks with minimal setup. It's ideal for projects where simplicity and low overhead are preferred.
items.title: DharamSavsani/MQ-flow: A lightweight, simple queue system designed for small tasks that need to be executed in a queued manner. This system is not a full-fledged message queue like BullMQ, RabbitMQ, or similar systems, but it offers an efficient solution for handling tasks with minimal setup. It's ideal for projects where simplicity and low overhead are preferred.
